pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for a lustful nun consenting to a lustful man making physical contact with her, to which of the four kinds of legal issues do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.2: They belong to legal issues arising from an offense. …
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.1: When it comes to the offenses for asking for curd and then eating it, to which of the four kinds of legal issues do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.2: They belong to legal issues arising from an offense. …
pli-tv-pvr2.6:3.1: The sixth section on legal issues is finished.
